p: Flowers are the more frequently used as a plant ingredient ( Table 2) especially in the “ zhourat” mixtures of Lebanon and Syria and in the Greek herbal mixtures. Fruits surpass flowers in herbal formulations of Iranian herbal teas and, especially in spice mixtures where flowers are rare ( Table 2). The category of aerial parts includes flowers and flower bracts in case of Lamiaceae such as Origanum dictamnus and others.
